Translations.Text: Na bene Aadi nabo barahakanye intumwa z’Imana
Mugihe	mwene	wabo	Hudu	(iii)	yababwira	ati:-	mbega	mwebwe ntimuzotinya Imana yanyu
Ntankeka jewe kuri mwebwe nd’intumwa y’Imana yizigiwe
Nimutinye Imana yanyu y’ukuri, kandi mungamburukire
Kandi	ntaco	nshaka	kuri	ibi	vyose,	mugabo	impembo	yanje	iri	ku muremyi w’abantu bose
Mbega mwiyubakira amazu ahari agatumba, uku n’ugufyinata muriko muragira
Mukiyubakira n’inzitiro nk’uko mubona yuko muzoramba mubuzima bwanyu bwose
No mugihe muteye abandi mubatera n’ubwishime
Nimutinye Imana yanyu y’ukuri kandi mungamburukire
Ko ariwe yabahaye ibikoko hamwe n’ibibondo vy’abahungu
Mu vy’ukuri ndabafitiye ubwoba bw’ibihano vy’umusi w’imperuka
Nabo bamwishuye bati:- n’ibisanzwe kuri twebwe	kuko udushikirije ubwo butumwa canke ntube mubabu dushikiriza
Ntivyari kuba ibi vyose atari uko ari ingeso z’abantu baho hambere
Rero baramuhakana natwe duca tubibiza mumazi, ntankeka muri ibi vyose harimwo ibitekerezo mugabo benshi muribo ntibari mu bantu bemera Imana yabo y’ukuri
Mu vy’ukuri Umuremyi wawe niwe nyene ububasha hamwe n’impuhwe zihagije
